reviewText: There is no such thing as "too much Shaun Evans." That is all.
Great story and great acting by all.  Looking forward to the availability of more British TV shows for the American market.
It was different, I liked it because I like Rupert Penry-Jones and Shaun Evans
Seen it when I visit my cousin in England and liked it i like Shaun  evens as inspector morse and in love rupert penry jones in whitechapel and mi-5 one of my favorite shows and actors

too much Shaun Evans in a creepy role and not enough Rupert Penry-Jones.
As if there is such a thing as too much Rupert Penry-Jones.
